confirmations.confirmed: Mae eich cyfeiriad e-bost wedi'i gadarnhau'n llwyddiannus.
confirmations.send_instructions: Byddwch yn derbyn e-bost gyda chyfarwyddiadau ar sut i gadarnhau eich cyfeiriad e-bost mewn ychydig funudau.
confirmations.send_paranoid_instructions: Os yw eich cyfeiriad e-bost yn bodoli yn ein cronfa ddata, byddwch yn derbyn e-bost gyda chyfarwyddiadau ar sut i gadarnhau eich cyfeiriad e-bost mewn ychydig funudau.

failure.inactive: Nid yw eich cyfrif wedi'i actifadu eto.
failure.last_attempt: Mae gennych un ymgais arall cyn i'ch cyfrif gael ei gloi.
failure.timeout: Daeth eich sesiwn i ben. Mewngofnodwch eto i barhau.
failure.unauthenticated: Mae angen i chi fewngofnodi neu gofrestru cyn parhau.
failure.unconfirmed: Mae'n rhaid i chi gadarnhau eich cyfeiriad e-bost cyn parhau.

omniauth_callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from %{kind} because "%{reason}".

passwords.no_token: Ni allwch gael mynediad i'r dudalen hon heb ddod o e-bost ailosod cyfrinair. Os ydych yn dod o e-bost ailosod cyfrinair, gwnewch yn siŵr eich bod wedi defnyddio'r URL llawn a ddarparwyd.
passwords.send_instructions: Byddwch yn derbyn e-bost gyda chyfarwyddiadau ar sut i ailosod eich cyfrinair mewn ychydig funudau.
passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: Os yw eich cyfeiriad e-bost yn bodoli yn ein cronfa ddata, byddwch yn derbyn dolen adfer cyfrinair yn eich cyfeiriad e-bost mewn ychydig funudau.
passwords.updated: Mae eich cyfrinair wedi'i newid yn llwyddiannus. Rydych chi bellach wedi mewngofnodi.
passwords.updated_not_active: Mae eich cyfrinair wedi'i newid yn llwyddiannus.

registrations.destroyed: Hwyl! Mae'ch cyfrif wedi'i ganslo'n llwyddiannus. Gobeithiwn eich gweld eto yn fuan.
registrations.signed_up: Croeso! Rydych chi wedi cofrestru'n llwyddiannus.
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: Rydych chi wedi cofrestru'n llwyddiannus. Fodd bynnag, ni allem eich mewngofnodi oherwydd nad yw eich cyfrif wedi'i actifadu eto.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: Rydych chi wedi cofrestru'n llwyddiannus. Fodd bynnag, ni allem eich mewngofnodi oherwydd bod eich cyfrif wedi'i gloi.
registrations.signed_up_but_unconfirmed: Mae neges gyda dolen cadarnhau wedi'i hanfon i'ch cyfeiriad e-bost. Dilynwch y ddolen i actifadu eich cyfrif.
registrations.update_needs_confirmation: Rydych wedi diweddaru eich cyfrif yn llwyddiannus, ond mae angen i ni wirio eich cyfeiriad e-bost newydd. Gwiriwch eich e-bost a dilynwch y ddolen cadarnhau i gadarnhau eich cyfeiriad e-bost newydd.

unlocks.send_instructions: Byddwch yn derbyn e-bost gyda chyfarwyddiadau ar sut i ddatgloi eich cyfrif mewn ychydig funudau.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: Os yw'ch cyfrif yn bodoli, byddwch yn derbyn e-bost gyda chyfarwyddiadau ar sut i'w ddatgloi mewn ychydig funudau.
unlocks.unlocked: Mae eich cyfrif wedi'i ddatgloi yn llwyddiannus. Mewngofnodwch i barhau.

carousel.message_1: Helpwch eich ysgol i arbed ynni, arian ac atal newid hinsawdd.
carousel.message_2: Dangoswch i'ch ysgol faint a phryd rydych chi'n defnyddio ynni.
carousel.message_3: Mynnwch gyngor arbed ynni wedi'i deilwra ar gyfer eich ysgol chi yn unig.
carousel.message_4: Sicrhewch rybuddion awtomataidd i roi gwybod i chi pan fydd eich defnydd o ynni yn newid.
carousel.message_5: Archwiliwch weithgareddau tîm eco a dosbarth ar gyfer disgyblion.
carousel.message_6: Rhannu syniadau arbed ynni a chystadlu yn erbyn ysgolion eraill.

local_authority.text: Dysgwch fwy am sut y gall Energy Sparks weithio gydag Awdurdodau Lleol i gefnogi ysgolion yn eu hardal.
local_authority.title: Ar gyfer Awdurdodau Lleol

multi_academy.button: Energy Sparks ar gyfer Ymddiriedolaethau Aml-Academi
multi_academy.text: Dysgwch fwy am sut mae Energy Sparks yn cefnogi Ymddiriedolaethau Aml-Academi.
multi_academy.title: Ar gyfer Ymddiriedolaethau Aml-Academi

school.text: Dysgwch fwy am sut y gall Energy Sparks gefnogi eich ysgol.
school.title: Ar gyfer ysgolion

home.sub_title: Offeryn dadansoddi ynni a rhaglen addysg ynni ar-lein yw Energy Sparks.
home.title: Rydym yn helpu ysgolion i fod yn fwy ynni-effeithlon a brwydro yn erbyn newid hinsawdd.

email_consent.subject: Your grant of consent to Energy Sparks

confirmations.confirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed.
confirmations.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.
confirmations.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.

failure.inactive: Your account is not activated yet.
failure.last_attempt: You have one more attempt before your account is locked.
failure.timeout: Your session expired. Please sign in again to continue.
failure.unauthenticated: You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
failure.unconfirmed: You have to confirm your email address before continuing.

omniauth_callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from %{kind} because "%{reason}".

passwords.no_token: You can't access this page without coming from a password reset email. If you do come from a password reset email, please make sure you used the full URL provided.
passwords.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password recovery link at your email address in a few minutes.
passwords.updated: Your password has been changed successfully. You are now signed in.
passwords.updated_not_active: Your password has been changed successfully.

registrations.destroyed: Bye! Your account has been successfully cancelled. We hope to see you again soon.
registrations.signed_up: Welcome! You have signed up successfully.
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is not yet activated.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is locked.
registrations.signed_up_but_unconfirmed: A message with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the link to activate your account.
registrations.update_needs_confirmation: You updated your account successfully, but we need to verify your new email address. Please check your email and follow the confirm link to confirm your new email address.
registrations.updated: Your account has been updated successfully.
registrations.updated_but_not_signed_in: Your account has been updated successfully, but since your password was changed, you need to sign in again.

unlocks.send_instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock your account in a few minutes.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: If your account exists, you will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock it in a few minutes.
unlocks.unlocked: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

carousel.message_1: Help your school save energy, money and prevent climate change.
carousel.message_2: Show your school how much and when you are using energy.
carousel.message_3: Get tailored energy saving advice designed just for your school.
carousel.message_4: Get automated alerts to let you know when your energy use changes.
carousel.message_5: Explore eco-team and classroom activities for pupils.
carousel.message_6: Share energy saving ideas and compete against other schools.

local_authority.text: Learn more about how Energy Sparks can work with Local Authorities to support schools in their area.
local_authority.title: For Local Authorities

multi_academy.text: Learn more about how Energy Sparks supports Multi-Academy Trusts.
multi_academy.title: For Multi-Academy Trusts

school.text: Learn more about how Energy Sparks can support your school.
school.title: For schools

home.sub_title: Energy Sparks is an online, school-specific energy analysis tool & energy education programme.
home.title: We help schools become more energy efficient and fight climate change.

desc.all_locales: Do not expect key patterns to start with a locale, instead apply them to all locales implicitly.
desc.keep_order: Keep the order of the keys
desc.new_key_name: New name, interpolates original name as %{key}. Required
desc.pattern_router: Use pattern router: keys moved per config data.write
desc.strict: Avoid inferring dynamic key usages such as t("cats.#{cat}.name"). Takes precedence over the config setting if set.

desc.add_missing: add missing keys to locale data
desc.check_consistent_interpolations: verify that all translations use correct interpolation variables
desc.check_normalized: verify that all translation data is normalized
desc.data_remove: remove keys present in tree from data
desc.eq_base: show translations equal to base value
desc.find: show where keys are used in the code
desc.irb: start REPL session within i18n-tasks context
desc.mv: rename/merge the keys in locale data that match the given pattern
desc.normalize: normalize translation data: sort and move to the right files
desc.rm: remove the keys in locale data that match the given pattern
desc.translate_missing: translate missing keys with Google Translate or DeepL Pro
desc.tree_mv_key: rename/merge/remove the keys matching the given pattern
desc.tree_set_value: set values of keys, optionally match a pattern
desc.tree_subtract: tree A minus the keys in tree B
desc.tree_translate: Google Translate a tree to root locales

data_stats.text: has %{key_count} keys across %{locale_count} locales. On average, values are %{value_chars_avg} characters long, keys have %{key_segments_avg} segments, a locale has %{per_locale_avg} keys.
data_stats.text_single_locale: has %{key_count} keys in total. On average, values are %{value_chars_avg} characters long, keys have %{key_segments_avg} segments.
data_stats.title: Forest (%{locales})

errors.no_api_key: Setup DeepL Pro API key via DEEPL_AUTH_KEY environment variable or translation.deepl_api_key in config/i18n-tasks.yml. Get the key at https://www.deepl.com/pro.
Set Google API key via GOOGLE_TRANSLATE_API_KEY environment variable or translation.google_translate_api_key in config/i18n-tasks.yml. Get the key at https://code.google.com/apis/console.
errors.no_results: Google Translate returned no results. Make sure billing information is set at https://code.google.com/apis/console.

health.no_keys_detected: No keys detected. Check data.read in config/i18n-tasks.yml.

missing.details_title: Value in other locales or source

errors.no_api_key: Set Yandex API key via YANDEX_API_KEY environment variable or translation.yandex_api_key in config/i18n-tasks.yml. Get the key at https://tech.yandex.com/translate.
